idea-plugin.name: Sticky Notes
idea-plugin.description:
Code Context Sticky Notes

Stop polluting your source code with temporary TODOs and mental breadcrumbs. Code Context Sticky Notes allows you to attach private, virtual notes directly to specific lines of code in the editor gutter.

Key Features:

  • Private Context: Notes are stored locally in your .idea folderâ€”they never get committed to Git.
  • Instant Access: Alt+Click on the line gutter to create a note instantly.
  • Gutter Visuals: See your notes at a glance with sleek gutter icons and hover tooltips.
  • Non-Intrusive: Keep your codebase clean while maintaining a high-detail mental map of complex logic.

Perfect for debugging sessions, complex refactors, or leaving personal reminders during a long development sprint.
